text: Haja de niradharita mahine hana. Isa la'i jisa ne inham niradharita mahini'am vica haja da irada kara li'a tam phira usa ne haja de daurana na ko'i gadi gala karani hai ate na papa di, na lara'i jhagare di gala. Ate jo bhale karama tusim karoge, alaha nu usa da gi'ana ho javega ate tusim safara da kharaca lavo. Sabha tom vadhi'a kharaca takava (parahezagari) da hai ate he budhi vali'o! Mere tom daro
